payload.message: Testing the isTestMode flag and font size reporting in the response.

setup: 1. Import the n8n-unified-workflow-corrected.json into your N8N instance
2. Update the Cloudinary URL and credentials in the 'Upload to Cloudinary' node
3. Pin one of the test scenarios above to the webhook node to test
4. Execute the workflow and verify the fonts are much larger than before
verification: 1. Check the console logs for font size reporting (should show 96pt+ sizes)
2. Verify 'isTestMode' flag is correctly detected and returned in response
3. Download the generated image from Cloudinary URL to visually confirm large fonts
4. Compare with previous tiny font postcards to confirm the fix worked

expectedBehavior.development: Returns Cloudinary URL to app, isTestMode: true, app handles Stannp with test=true flag
expectedBehavior.production: Returns Cloudinary URL to app, isTestMode: false, app handles Stannp with test=false
